category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 22 (Marketing Committee)
contents: Article 22 (Marketing Committee) The Marketing Committee shall respond to the Chairman's advice on the following matters. Revised 2019. 1. 31., 2023. 7. 5. 1. Matters pertaining to the basic policy of marketing business 2. Matters pertaining to activation of marketing business 3. Matters pertaining to profit-making business of the Korea Sports Council 4. Matters pertaining to marketing asset development and management 5. Other matters deemed to be in accordance with the functions of the Marketing Committee and submitted by the Chairman [This Article Newly Inserted on April 3, 2017]
